answers.answer: Hey there I would make an appt... I know money might be tight but you dont want to risk your life or if there is a little one in there too! I took HPT and all came out neg until I went to the ER and they did a blood test and found out that I was 6 weeks along and thats right before I took a HPT that day.  Dont push it back too far.

question: after my first child was born i was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and told not to have any more children with out consulting my doctor first. My daughter will be 4 in may. In december i had my period. Where is normally comes on the 3rd and lasts about 5-7 days well it only lasted 3 days and was very late. it is noe january and i have gotten my period. I took a test about the 5th and it said negative. i waited til sunday the 11 and took another one and its negative. i wouldn't mind having another child but i dont wanna harm myself or the child. I feel bloated and sick but there is a stomach virus going around. i have slight headaches every now and then, and i stay tired all the time, not sleepy but tired. i dont want to make a big deal out of nothing and right now i cant really go to the doctor i dontt havve any extra money. i plan on going to thr health department to see if they can tell me anything. should i be concerned about this. dont know what to do.
title: whats wrong with me?
